name: Auckland, New Zealand
description: The burgers here isn't a gimmick, it's real organ and you can test the flavor. One of the most relaxing places to visit and being able to experience the ports while enjoying top tier 5-stars restaurants is a must-do!

name: Honolulu, Hawaii
description: What is there to say? This is Hawaii, one of the best places to enjoy life and have fun. The trip is worth it and being able to visit volcanos is always a plus.

name: Virginia Beach, Virginia
description: Amazing stores and beachfront to explore during our visits! Being able to enjoy the walk-way and attractions at night during holidays becomes very entertaining.
